Every incoming student is immediately paired with a dedicated Faculty Advisor who provides personalized academic and college counseling throughout their four years. For students showing exceptional potential, we also facilitate early access to specialized faculty research groups, offering one-on-one mentorship in advanced fields. We are highly interested in students who demonstrate the clarity of goals you possess, and we are confident our structure would maximize your success here.
